text: Ivan Sergeyevich Oblyakov (; born 5 July 1998) is a Russian football player who plays as a central midfielder for PFC CSKA Moscow. ==Career== ===Club=== Oblyakov made his debut in the Russian Football Premier League for FC Ufa on 31 July 2016 in a game against FC Ural Sverdlovsk Oblast. On 31 August 2018, Oblyakov signed a 5-year contract with PFC CSKA Moscow. ===International=== Oblyakov was first called up to Russia national football team for UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying matches against San Marino and Cyprus in June 2019. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=4|FC Ufa |2016–17 |rowspan=3|Russian Premier League |20||1||2||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||22||1 |- |2017–18 |20||2||1||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||21||2 |- |2018–19 |5||0||0||0||6||1||0||0||11||1 |- !colspan=2|Total !45!!3!!3!!0!!6!!1!!0!!0!!54!!4 |- |rowspan=3|CSKA Moscow |2018–19 |rowspan=2|Russian Premier League |23||3||0||0||6||0||0||0||29||3 |- |2019–20 |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||0||0 |- !colspan=2|Total !23!!3!!0!!0!!6!!0!!0!!0!!29!!3 |- !colspan=3|Total !68!!6!!3!!0!!12!!1!!0!!0!!83!!7 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:People from Volkhovsky District Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Ufa players Category:PFC CSKA Moscow players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russia youth international footballers Category:Russia under-21 international footballers
